test-case.name: nodeexpression1
test-case.description: Test of a ComparisonExpression with the operands set as follows operand1 = empty Sequence operator = is operand2 = empty Sequence

test-case.description: Test of a ComparisonExpression with the operands set as follows operand1 = empty Sequence operator = is operand2 = Single Element Constructor

test-case.name: nodeexpressionhc1
test-case.description: Test of a Node Expression used as an argument to the fn not function

test-case.name: nodeexpressionhc2
test-case.description: Test of a Node Expression used as part of a boolean-less-than expression (lt operator).

test-case.name: nodeexpressionhc3
test-case.description: Test of a Node Expression used as part of a boolean less than expression (ge) operator

test-case.name: nodeexpressionhc4
test-case.description: Test of a Node Expression used as part of a boolean greater than expression (gt) operator.

test-case.name: nodeexpressionhc5
test-case.description: Test of a Node Expression used as part of a boolean greater than expression (le) operator

test-case.name: nodecomparisonerr-1
test-case.description: A node comparison where one of the operands is not the empty sequence or a single node.

test-case.name: K-NodeSame-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(1 is ())`.

test-case.name: K-NodeSame-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(() is 1)`.

test-case.name: K-NodeSame-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `1 is 1`.

test-case.name: K-NodeSame-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(() is ())`.

test-case.name: K-NodeSame-5
test-case.description: A syntactically invalid expression.

test-case.name: K-NodeSame-6
test-case.description: A query reminding of an invokation of 'is' operator. However, this is not a parse error(XPST0003), because it is a valid function call, although to a non-existant function. 'is' is not a reserved function name.

test-case.name: K2-NodeSame-1
test-case.description: Ensure node identity is is correct for variables and element constructors.

test-case.name: K2-NodeSame-2
test-case.description: Ensure node identity is is correct between variable references.

test-case.name: K2-NodeSame-3
test-case.description: Ensure node identity is is correct for variables and element constructors(#2).

test-case.name: K2-NodeSame-4
test-case.description: Ensure node identity of nodes used with node constructors.
test-case.test: declare variable $e := attribute name {()}; $e is $e, <is/> is <is/>

test-case.name: K2-NodeSame-5
test-case.description: exactly-one() to is, that fails. Inferrence may conclude that it will always evaluate to false, so that is valid as well.

test-case.name: K2-NodeSame-6
test-case.description: Compare two empty sequences, that are tricky to infer at compile time.

test-case.name: cbcl-node-same-001
test-case.description: test is same node operator

test-case.name: cbcl-node-same-002
test-case.description: test is same node operator

test-case.name: cbcl-is-same-node-001
test-case.description: Check node identity for return values of creative user defined functions.
test-case.test: declare function local:f() as node() { <a/> }; local:f() is local:f()

test-case.name: cbcl-is-same-node-002
test-case.description: Only one comparison allowed per expression, unless parenthesized
